description: New York is America’s most Italian city, with its vibrant culture and cuisine found on almost every corner. So when you see locals, who have seen and tried it all, loving every bite of Ponti Rossi’s authentic Italian dishes, you just know you’re in for quite a tasty street treat.  Ponti Rossi’s selection of homemade and deliciously fresh pasta, pizza, and panini, serves as a direct bridge between Italy and New York, and you’re sure to adore this fast food that tastes like it took all Sunday to cook!
name: Ponti Rossi
